divs: Sighting Details I was outside skywatching and looking to the southeast area at the right moment, I saw 4 bright white flashes in a row about 1 sec. apart. immediately following the last flash, the other object flashed 2 times with the same intensity and color as the first object. It appeared the first object was leading and the second was to the left 4 inches looking arms length to my finger and either lower or back futher away 3 or 4 inches. nothing else was seen. One half hour later, I saw a single flash just like the one earlier directly over my head, 3 secs later, it flashed once again, but had moved such a great distance so fast, and was right above the Mountian next to Rathdrum Mt. then it appeared to set down on the top and glow a white light for about 15 mins. along with one now glowing the same way on Rathdrum Mt. both lights faded out of my sight and nothing else seen. I have already filed with a local field investigator.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Coeur d'Alene
There were no other sightings in Coeur d'Alene on or around June 26th 2008
